interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: AG Care Natural Remedy Apple Cider Vinegar Leave On Mist Review Date: 2019/01/06 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AG Care', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair.Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair. See more', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 6 inches; 6.14 Ounces', 'Item model number': '100150', 'UPC': '625336002391', 'Manufacturer': 'AG Hair', 'Country of Origin': 'Canada'} Review Text: This leave in hair remedy from AG smells wonderful, like a sweet and spicy scent. While it applies strong, it dissipated and left behind a soft clean spicy smell.
It worked really well, and was best when I used it after a work out on damp hair vs dry or showered.
It’s a nice product in my easy care hair Arsenal, I will be picking it up again for my gym bag for sure! Review Title: Soft hair, smells great! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
30 PCS Blue Hair Care Rollers Hair Curlers Silicone No Clip Hair Style Rollers Soft Magic DIY Curling Hairstyle Tools Hair Accessories ONEONEY {'Item Form': 'Clip', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'ONEONEY', 'Unit Count': '30.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.31 x 2.68 inches; 8.57 Ounces'} These are an inexpensive and fairly comfortable way to roll my hair at night. It makes getting up and being ready to go in the morning much faster, since all I have to do is unroll, give a spray and shake - and bam waves for days.
However, the quality is decent but not great, one of the rollers looked like it was left out side and got chewed on. But, 1 out of 30 (I counted them) is still good odds for the price.
They came in the matching clear blue zipper bag, and are easy to store. I'd happily purchase another set. Comfy curls AG Care Natural Remedy Apple Cider Vinegar Leave On Mist {'Brand': 'AG Care', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair.Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair. See more', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 6 inches; 6.14 Ounces', 'Item model number': '100150', 'UPC': '625336002391', 'Manufacturer': 'AG Hair', 'Country of Origin': 'Canada'} This leave in hair remedy from AG smells wonderful, like a sweet and spicy scent. While it applies strong, it dissipated and left behind a soft clean spicy smell.
It worked really well, and was best when I used it after a work out on damp hair vs dry or showered.
It’s a nice product in my easy care hair Arsenal, I will be picking it up again for my gym bag for sure! Soft hair, smells great!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care & Styling**: The user has a strong interest in hair styling tools and methods, particularly DIY techniques for achieving curls. They prefer soft rollers for overnight use, highlighting a focus on convenience in their morning routines. Recently, they have shown an appreciation for leave-in treatments that enhance hair texture and fragrance.

- **Value for Money**: They prioritize budget-friendly options and appreciate products that deliver quality at an affordable price. The user is open to accepting minor defects if the overall value is justifiable, as indicated by their reviews.

- **Ease of Use**: The user looks for products that simplify their hair care routine, as they have a preference for quick and easy styling methods. They gravitate towards products that can be easily incorporated into their daily life and that enhance their hair care arsenal.

- **Storage & Organization**: They value items that come with easy storage solutions, reflecting their organizational tendencies.

- **Quality Considerations**: While being price-sensitive, the user expects reasonable quality and functionality from hair care products. Their ratings demonstrate a positive response to effective products that fit within their lifestyle, favoring those that provide additional benefits such as pleasant scents and improved hair condition.

Overall, the user maintains a practical approach to beauty and hair care, focusing on functionality, comfort, effectiveness, and affordability while integrating convenient products into their routine.
